tactics.name: Rank Score Accumulation
tactics.description: Each book sale/download adds a point to the rank score, with daily decay of previous points.
steps: Maintain consistent marketing without price changes
caveats: Decay rate reduces effectiveness after 5 days
source_quotes: each seller download of a product counts as one point towards that hypothetical like rank score

tactics.name: Subcategory Focus
tactics.description: Target low-competition subcategories to avoid direct competition with top authors.
source_quotes: understanding how to rank it's by sub category that's really empowering

heuristics.name: Decay Optimization
heuristics.condition: If sales are driven over 4-5 days, the rank score accumulates more effectively
source_quotes: each day the preceding day score decreases by half and is added to today's points

claims.statement: Amazon's BSR algorithm prioritizes recent sales/downloads with exponential decay
source_quotes: each day the preceding day score decreases by half and is added to today's points

niche_patterns.description: Targets underserved niches with low competition and high demand
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines specific identity with problem-solving potential in constrained markets
source_quotes: being able to rank books and other categories along with low content has been really great
